project.description: Allows dataloader operations from one environment

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Fields
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: List of field names in the csv

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Object
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the object being inserted

hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: TheCSV
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: Optionally provide the csv of date for the operation. If not provided the one in stored in the svn/git repository will be used

hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: SDLFILE
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: Optionally provide a mapping of Field names to field names in the CSV. If not provided, one will be generated and will assume all fields names in the CSV are identical to the field names in the Salesforce Org

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Endpoint
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Which endpoint the environment uses (i.e. is it production or sandbox)

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Operation
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: What operation is being performed through dataloader For Delete,Upsert,Insert and Update a CSV must be provided

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WhereClause
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Used for Extract only , a where clause written in SOQL to limit which records are returned

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ExternalID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For Upsert operation - The field that should be used as the external Id to match records on

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ExternalRelationship
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For Upsert operation (OPTIONAL) - If matching on a field on an object related to the target object provide the name of the related object

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: mv ${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/${JOB_NAME}/*.csv ${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/${JOB_NAME}/generic_cliqJob/read/genericObject.csv || echo "No csv provided in repository"
cd dataLoader_jars && dataloader="$(ls | grep dataloader | grep .jar | tail -n 1)" && cp $dataloader ../generic_cliqJob/ && cp $dataloader .. && cd ..

buildStep.command: dataloader="$(ls | grep dataloader | grep .jar)" && password="$(java -cp $dataloader com.salesforce.dataloader.security.EncryptionUtil -e $SFDPASS | tail -n 1)" && java GenerateCliqScript -f $Fields -sp NOTUSED -su NOTUSED -o $Object -du $SFDUSER -dp $password -l /generic_cliqJob/ -e $Endpoint -dlv $dataloader -upsertId $ExternalID -upsertR $ExternalRelationship

dataloader="$(ls | grep dataloader | grep .jar)" && password="$(java -cp $dataloader com.salesforce.dataloader.security.EncryptionUtil -e $SFDPASS | awk '{print $NF}')" && java GenerateCliqScript -f $Fields -sp $password -su $SFDUSER -o $Object -du $SFDUSER -dp $password -l /generic_cliqJob/ -e $Endpoint -dlv $dataloader -w $WhereClause

dataloader="$(ls | grep dataloader | grep .jar)" && password="$(java -cp $dataloader com.salesforce.dataloader.security.EncryptionUtil -e $SFDPASS | awk '{print $NF}')" && java GenerateCliqScript -f $Fields -sp NOTUSED -su NOTUSED -o $Object -du $SFDUSER -dp $password -l /generic_cliqJob/ -e $Endpoint -dlv $dataloader

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: touch log.txt && script="${Operation}Object.sh" && generic_cliqJob/$script > log.txt || cat log.txt

rm -rf buildfiles dataload* dataL* *.class *.java TheCSV SDLFILE sample* Schedul* && cp generic_cliqJob/log/* . && cp generic_cliqJob/read/* . && cp generic_cliqJob/config/* . && rm -rf generic_cliqJob
set +x && echo "==================================================================" && echo "The build has completed." && cat myFile.txt | grep 'There are [0-9]* successes and [0-9]* errors' -o **

set +x && successes="$(ls | grep success)" && errors="$(ls | grep error)" && properties="$(ls | grep .properties)" && url="${JOB_URL}ws/" && \ printf "The success file is available at $url$successes 

 The errors file is available at $url$errors 

 The properties of this operation are available at $url$properties 

" && \ echo "The csv of records is availabe at ${url}genericObject.csv" && \ echo "==================================================================" && rm *.txt
